/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, with their traditional Chinese architectural style, are adorned with ornate roofs and intricate decorations, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of the city. The trees, with their lush green foliage, provide a refreshing contrast to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall serene atmosphere of the scene.
